titleStmt.title: World Wide Diplomatic Archives Index: Latvia
Latvia

div.head: Legislation
div.p: Several laws passed since Latvian independence in 1991 dictate access to Foreign Affairs archives. The diplomatic historical archives (1918 - 1990) are accessible to national and foreign researchers at the Latvia State Historical Archives. Latvian researchers may request access to post 1990 documents housed at the Ministry of Foreign Affairs Archives. Foreign researchers may not access the documents of the Ministry.

div.head: Location
div.p: Archives of Ministry of Foreign Affairs of Republic of Latvia: 36 boulevard Brīvības, LV 1395 Riga
Latvia State Historical Archives: 16 Slokas Street, LV 1007 Riga

div.head: Procedures
div.p: Today all archives of the Ministry and legations from 1918 to 1990 are kept in the Latvian State Historical Archives. Researchers must present a letter of introduction from their institution or university.
